H0.text: Who became Secretary -General of the Soviet Communist Party in 1985. Andrei Gromyko

H1.text: Who became Secretary -General of the Soviet Communist Party in 1985. Nikolai Ryzhkov

H2.text: Who became Secretary -General of the Soviet Communist Party in 1985. Yegor Ligachev

H3.text: Who became Secretary -General of the Soviet Communist Party in 1985. Gorbačëv

A5.text: At the age of 54, Mikhail Gorbachev was elected to the general secretariat by Politburo on 11 March 1985.
